title: Policy Statement
content:
Our organization is committed to providing a safe and healthy work environment for all employees, contractors, visitors, and clients. We comply with the Work Health and Safety Act 2011 and associated regulations.

Safety is everyone's responsibility and is integral to all business operations.

title: Responsibilities
content:
Management:

  • Provide leadership in health and safety matters
  • Ensure adequate resources for safety programs
  • Monitor and review safety performance

Employees:

  • Follow safety procedures and instructions
  • Report hazards and incidents immediately
  • Participate in safety training
  • Use personal protective equipment as required

title: Risk Management
content:
We implement a systematic approach to risk management:

  • Identify workplace hazards
  • Assess risks associated with hazards
  • Implement control measures
  • Monitor and review effectiveness

Risk assessments are conducted regularly and when workplace changes occur.

title: Incident Reporting
content:
All workplace incidents, injuries, and near misses must be reported immediately to management.

We maintain an incident register and investigate all incidents to prevent recurrence.

Workers' compensation claims are managed in accordance with relevant legislation.

title: Training and Consultation
content:
We provide:

  • Induction training for all new workers
  • Ongoing safety training and education
  • Regular consultation with workers on safety matters
  • Access to safety information and resources

Training records are maintained and reviewed regularly.
